q_contact.name: The Contact
q_contact.summary: Find the Resistance leader hiding in the slums.
q_contact.description: Biggs, a defector, says the Resistance leader Celes is hiding in the Abandoned House in Aetheria. You need to find her to join the cause.
objectives: Go to the Abandoned House in Aetheria.

q_scraps.name: Scrap Metal
q_scraps.description: Cid needs parts to repair the resistance radio. Magitek Soldiers in the sewers drop them.
objectives: Collect 3 Magitek Scraps from Magitek Soldiers.

q_radio.name: The Signal
q_radio.summary: Find a Vacuum Tube to fix the radio.
q_radio.description: The radio needs a specific Vacuum Tube. Cid thinks one might be in the deeper sewers.
objectives: Search the Sewers (Floor 2) for a Radio Tube.

q_leak.name: The Leak
q_leak.summary: Investigate the Aether leak in the sewers.
q_leak.description: The Aether levels in the sewers are spiking. Something is down there causing it.
objectives: Defeat the Sewer King on Floor 3.

q_codes.name: Missing Courier
q_codes.description: A courier carrying encryption keys never arrived. He was last seen near the Pub.

q_infiltrate.name: Infiltration
q_infiltrate.description: We have the codes. Use the encryption key to access the Factory entrance.

q_uniform.name: The Disguise
q_uniform.description: To move freely in the factory, you need a disguise. Steal one from an Officer.
objectives: Obtain an Imperial Uniform from an Officer.

q_sabotage.name: Sabotage
q_sabotage.description: Plant a bomb on the main generator in the factory.

q_rescue.name: Prison Break
q_rescue.description: Reports say they have a live Esper in the detention block. We must free them.
objectives: Find the detention block on Floor 6.

q_core.name: Aether Core
q_core.description: We need their power source to fuel our airship.
objectives: Find the Core in the research lab.

q_boss.name: Proto-Armor
q_boss.description: The factory defenses have activated a prototype armor. Destroy it!
objectives: Defeat the Proto Armor on Floor 6.

q_airship.name: The Blackjack
q_airship.description: The gambler Setzer will help us, if we fix his ship. We need the Aether Core we stole.
objectives: Deliver the Aether Core to Setzer at the Pub.

q_summit.name: To the Skies
q_summit.description: The Empire has raised a continent into the sky. We must follow them.

q_kefka.name: Mad Clown
q_kefka.description: Kefka is trying to absorb the Warring Triad. Stop him at all costs.
objectives: Confront Kefka on the Floating Continent.

q_guardian.name: The Ultimate Weapon
q_guardian.description: Kefka has unleashed the ancient beast. Defeat it.

q_restore.name: World of Hope
q_restore.description: The world is shaking. Find the elemental cores to stabilize it.
